===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} - A man with his legs bending, and a side to the front. The picture is variously interpreted as either sitting or lying, with its original meaning being "corpse".

When used as a radical, 尸 is usually derived from a variation of [[人]] or [[亻]], as in [[尾]].
